name: Carousel
description: Horizontal scrolling carousel of business cards for RCS messaging

components.name: Carousel Business
components.description: Business card carousel with small and large variants

props.cards: Array of CarouselCard objects with title, description, media, actions
props.onCardAction: Function - callback when card action is clicked

designNotes: Supports horizontal scrolling with partial next card visible
Actions can be reply (gray) or action (blue) types
Android variant uses smaller border radius and font sizes
Media images lazy load for performance
Hover effects include subtle elevation changes

cardStructure.actions: Array of reply/action buttons with callbacks
